description:
Life is much easier when you're organized. Keep your items together with these convenient containers. The 180 degree twist locking mechanism and silicone gasket create a watertight seal without having to cinch the lids down. The small size is perfect for spices or herbs, lotions, or small snacks.

  • Made of FDA food-safe and microwave-safe (without lid) polypropylene
  • Silicone gasket in lid prevents leaks
  • Lids secure to bottom of containers, reducing the chance of a lost lid and lets you stack containers
  • Full set has a total capacity of 77ml
  • Includes 2 short containers, 1 mid container, 1 tall container, 4 lids, and ClipHandle
name: Humangear Stax Small Starter 4-Pack
